title: Shopify and the Power of Platforms
excerpt: It is all but impossible to beat an Aggregator head-on, as Walmart is trying to do with Amazon. The solution instead is to build a platform like Shopify.

title: Shopify App Store: Ecommerce App Marketplace
excerpt: Shopify App Store: customize your online store and grow your business with Shopify-approved apps for marketing, store design, fulfillment, and more.
